alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 2:57PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Custer and western Pennington Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southeast of Medicine Mountain, or 5 miles southwest of Hill City, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Custer and western Pennington Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Southern Black Hills
